entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 12:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -11.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains early this afternoon. Wind becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
